name: Lucky Love!
description:
Is trying to get a date too easy for you? Let pure chance determine your love life! Lucky Love! is a game about going on a date, but everything along the way is determined by a number on a dice! 

                                                                                                                

Want to buy your date a nice gift? Let fate decide!

                                                                                                                 

Match your choices with the date that you choose are given, and see if the date went well by the end! 

This game was developed as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

(Good luck getting the best ending)

Controls: 

Most of the game can be played with just the mouse. 

Pause the game using esc. 

Switch from fullscreen to windowed by using Alt+Enter.
